meanings.sent1: My arm feels achier today than it did yesterday.
meanings.sent2: She prefers a softer mattress because it is achier.
meanings.sent3: After the long hike, his achier legs made him regret not stretching.
meanings.sent4: The achier silence in the room made her realize something was wrong.
meanings.sent5: The achier pain in his back was a constant reminder of his injury.

meanings.definition: Causing or experiencing a dull persistent pain.
meanings.sent1: The achier tooth kept him up all night.
meanings.sent2: The achier muscles were a result of the intense workout.
meanings.sent3: The achier headache made it hard for her to concentrate.
meanings.sent4: The achier joints in the cold weather made him move slower.
meanings.sent5: The achier sensation in her stomach signaled the onset of a stomach ache.
